item.title: CV
item.description: This is raw HTML, inside Markdown. Consultant Work Jun 2015 - Aug 2017: Student Developer @ Schantz Part of the internal Build and Deploy team (aka devops), where task includes all parts of the CI/CD pipelines and flows. Also helping developers debug pipelines and code issues. Tools and technologies: Jenkins Git Java Groovy Python Jan 2014 - Jun 2015: IT Support Assistant @ Schantz Helping out in the internal IT support team.
